title: Override Calculation Function
description: This function calculates an override value based on the input parameters. The override value is determined by comparing three input values and their corresponding enable flags. If a flag is enabled, the associated value is considered for the override. The function returns the highest absolute value among the inputs that have their enable flags set to true.
name: OVERRIDE

input.name: X1
input.description: The first input value used in the override calculation.

input.name: X2
input.description: The second input value used in the override calculation.

input.name: X3
input.description: The third input value used in the override calculation.

input.name: E1
input.description: Enable flag for the first input value.

input.name: E2
input.description: Enable flag for the second input value.

input.name: E3
input.description: Enable flag for the third input value.

return_value.description: The calculated override value based on the input parameters.
